homeHeader.title: Ajman Free Zone Business Setup Made Easy With One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Time-consuming forms, hidden rules, and regulatory hurdles often slow down business setup in the UAE. At One Nexuz, we make Ajman Free Zone company formation simple, transparent, and stress-free. From full ownership to compliance support, our experts handle every step with clarity and speed — giving you the freedom to focus on growth while we manage the complexities.

items.subTitle: Access Global Markets, Connect Effortlessly, and Expand Seamlessly
items.description: Reaching the right customers beyond borders can be challenging. Ajman’s prime location gives you direct access to major ports, airports, and road networks, making it easier to connect with regional and international markets.

items.title: Get Unmatched Tax Advantages, Maximise Profits, and Secure Financial Freedom
items.subTitle: Get Unmatched Tax Advantages, Maximise Profits, and Secure Financial Freedom
items.description: Businesses in Ajman Free Zone enjoy 0% corporate and personal income tax, along with 100% profit repatriation. This tax-free environment strengthens profitability and ensures that more of your earnings stay where they belong — with your business.

items.title: Own 100% of Your Business in Ajman Free Zone
items.subTitle: Own 100% of Your Business in Ajman Free Zone
items.description: Unlike traditional structures that rely on local sponsors, Ajman Free Zone offers complete foreign ownership. That means full authority over your operations, total decision-making freedom, and the flexibility to scale your business exactly the way you envision.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to get a license in the Ajman Free Zone?
items.answer: You can get licensed in as little as 48 hours, as long as you submit all documents on time. Our experts fast-track the process so you can lunch without delays.

items.question: What documents do I need to start a business in the Ajman Free Zone?
items.answer: Typically, you’ll need a copy of a valid passport, passport-sized photos, and a complete application form. Depending on your activity, you may also need a business plan.

items.question: Can I apply for a visa using my Ajman Free Zone license?
items.answer: Yes, you can apply for up to 5 UAE residency visas, depending on the selected license, allowing you to grow your team hassle-free.

items.question: Is it necessary to get a physical office to register in the Ajman Free Zone?
items.answer: No. Ajman Free Zone offers flexi-desk and virtual office options, allowing you to set up without leasing a physical space.

items.question: What business licenses can I get in the Ajman Free Zone?
items.answer: The free zone offers diverse licenses, including commercial, trading, e-commerce, professional, industrial, and freelancing licenses.

items.question: What are the Ajman Free Zone company setup costs?
items.answer: You can explore our affordable business setup packages to compare the total costs for launching your business in various Ajman free zones.
